title: How to Make a Sonic Strawberry Cheesecake Shake

steps.headline: Pour your milk, cheesecake mix, strawberries, and ice cream into a blender.
Blend those ingredients together on high speed until it becomes smooth.
Get two glasses (12 ounce) and pour evenly.
Use the aerosol whipped cream to top the drinks off.
steps.description: Sprinkle some graham cracker crumbs on top of the whipped cream.

text: Pour your milk, cheesecake mix, strawberries, and ice cream into a blender.  Blend those ingredients together on high speed until it becomes smooth.  Get two glasses (12 ounce) and pour evenly.  Use the aerosol whipped cream to top the drinks off. Sprinkle some graham cracker crumbs on top of the whipped cream. Serve and enjoy!
